overview:
Tiberius is Co-Founder and Software Architect at HouseFix, owner at Pragmatic Solutions SRL, and Vice President at ARIIS. He completed his Computer Science PhD in Grid Computing, and also has a Masters degree in Computer Science.

He won 1st place with his team at an international Computer Science competition organized by IEEE in 2002, followed by 2nd place the following year. Only 10 teams from all over the world qualify each year for the finals. He started Pragmatic Solutions shortly thereafter, providing customized software solutions for public and private companies. At ARIIS, an NGO, he helps bridge the gap between different civil society actors by providing technological leadership and vision to improve the dissemination of information and increase social engagement.
